short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggles a panel for playing all embedded Youtube videos on a Wordpress blog

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
(or, for the HTML-savvy: Works on any web page featuring Youtube videos embedded in iframes, all with a matching class.)
